ingredients: 8 ounces capellini (angel hair pasta) 1/4 cup low-sodium vegetable broth 1 tablespoon tamari, more to taste 1/2 teaspoon toasted sesame oil 1 pinch crushed red chile flakes 1 tablespoon peanut oil 1 tablespoon finely chopped fresh ginger root 1 large clove garlic, finely chopped 2 cups thinly sliced Napa cabbage 1 cup fresh bean sprouts, such as mung bean or broccoli sprouts 1/4 cup chopped fresh cilantro 1/2 cup chopped roasted peanuts

8 ounces capellini (angel hair pasta)
1/4 cup low-sodium vegetable broth
1 tablespoon tamari, more to taste
1/2 teaspoon toasted sesame oil
1 pinch crushed red chile flakes
1 tablespoon peanut oil
1 tablespoon finely chopped fresh ginger root
1 large clove garlic, finely chopped
2 cups thinly sliced Napa cabbage
1 cup fresh bean sprouts, such as mung bean or broccoli sprouts
1/4 cup chopped fresh cilantro
1/2 cup chopped roasted peanuts
